title: Slide Out Menu
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the app is in 'Postseason' mode
custom_steps: When the user taps the slide-out menu

custom_steps_separated.content: with NO favorite team set
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see 'Postseason' as one of the available options
And the order of the items should be: Postseason, Scoreboard, News...

custom_steps_separated.content: with a favorite team(s) set
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see 'Postseason' as one of the available options
And the order of the items should be: Favorite Team, Postseason, Scoreboard, News...

title: Default Series
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the default series has been set
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the postseason section
custom_expected: Then the default round of the postseason should load

title: MLB.TV
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the postseason section
And the user taps the TV button in the top right corner
custom_expected: Then user should be taken to the MLB.TV EPG where they can see a list of scheduled games

title: Audio
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is logged in with a paid account
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the postseason section
And the user taps the Audio button in the top right corner
custom_expected:
Then user should be taken to the Audio EPG where they can see a list of available games
Or the user should be taken to the Audio EPG where they can see a message indicating that there are no games currently available

title: Series Navigation
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the app in in Postseason mode
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Postseason section

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user sees the postseason series type in the segmented control at the top
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see each of the postseason series types as available options (WC, DS, LCS, WS)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps a given series type from the segmented control or swipes left/right
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken to the selected series type within the postseason section
And the selected series type will appear highlighted in the segmented control at the top of the section

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to a series that does not yet have teams slotted
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see the full series matchup
And the team slots will be filled by "TBD vs. TBD"

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is viewing any of the WC, DS, and LCS screens & series matchups
and drags up from the bottom
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a Postseason watermark with the correct year and logo

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user is viewing the WS screen
and drags up from the bottom
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a World Series watermark with the correct year and logo

title: Team & Game Data
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the app is in 'Postseason' mode
custom_steps: When the user is viewing the Postseason Section
custom_expected:
Then team names & logos should be correct
and the dates and times should appear correctly and match the data on mlb.com for the given series

title: Series Status & Games
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the app is in 'Postseason' mode
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Postseason section

custom_steps_separated.content: When the round is any round other than the Wild Card round
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then underneath the selected series matchup, the user should see the series matchup status. (See below)

Examples:
[Series] begins [date]
Series Opener
Series tied 1-1
[Team] lead series 2-1
[Team] win series 4-2

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user selects any round of the playoffs in which a series was completed in fewer than the maximum amount of games 
(fewer than 5 games for DS, fewer than 7 games for LCS and WS)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the games that were not necessary should be removed from the matchup

title: In-Progress Games
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there is a game in progress
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Postseason section

custom_steps_separated.content: Postseason Scoreboard
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the following should update properly on the Postseason scoreboard:

runs
basepath indicators
outs
inning status (Top/Mid/Bot/End)
current pitcher/batter matchup
"Watch on [TV logo]"

custom_steps_separated.content: Game Status Text
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Game 1 of series: Game 1 Live
All other games: use Final state
ex: 
[Team] lead series 2-1
Series tied 1-1

title: Game States
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
and postseason mode has been enabled
custom_steps:
When a postseason game goes into each of the following game states:

- Preview
- Delayed Start
- Delayed Start Ceremony
- In-game Delay
- In-game Ceremony
- Warm-up
- Live
- Final (Early, 9 innings, extra innings)
- Suspended
- Postponed
- Forfeit
- Canceled
custom_expected: The the postseason scoreboard should display each of the games states correctly

title: Broadcaster Logo
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Postseason section
custom_expected: Then the text "Watch on [broadcaster logo]" for games in preview and in progress states should be shown

title: Gameday
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Postseason section
And the user taps on a game cell in the scoreboard
custom_expected:
Then the Gameday page for that game should open
(Verify that game that opens corresponds to game that was tapped)

title: App Refresh
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps: When the user is in the Postseason section

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user sends the app to the background
and the user subsequently returns the app to the foreground
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the app should immediately resume and subsequently refresh according to its normal refresh cycle

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user lets the device fall asleep
and the user subsequently wakes the device up
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the app should resume its normal refresh cycle

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps the device power button to put the device into sleep/lock
and the user subsequently wakes the device up
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the app should resume its normal refresh cycle

title: Schedule Config Change
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is in the Postseason section
And the user is viewing the series that is set to the 'featured' series

Please refer to the following info:
In Extras, https://qa-atbatappconfig.mlb.com/android/6.5.0/lite-phone/extras.xml

<statsMode>  1 </statsMode>

0 = Spring, 1 = Regular Season, 2 = Postseason Total, 3 = Wild Card, 4 = Division, 5 = LCS, 6 = WS
custom_steps: When the 'featured' series is changed on the server
custom_expected:
Then the series that the user is viewing should NOT update to reflect that change
And when the user leaves then subsequently returns to the postseason section they will see the change.
(ex: looking at DET/NYY series which is default and the default is changed to CIN/ATL - view will not reload while user is viewing)

title: Hide Scores
custom_preconds:
Given the app is in Postseason mode
and Hide Scores has been enabled in app Settings

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the Postseason section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the series tabs will respect the user settings
and scores AND series status text will be hidden

custom_steps_separated.content:
If there is a Perfect game/No-hitter in progress (into the 6th inning)
or if a Perfect game/No-hitter has gone Final
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the PG/NH label should not appear

custom_steps_separated.content:
If "headerOverrideLine2" in the Postseason config (https://content.mlb.com/app/mlb/mobile/postseason/postSeasonScheduleConfig.xml) is set to true
and there is text in the field
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the field text should not appear

custom_steps_separated.content: If "headerOverrideLine2" in the Postseason config (https://content.mlb.com/app/mlb/mobile/postseason/postSeasonScheduleConfig.xml) is set to false
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the default editorial text should not appear

title: Date Ranges
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the date range has been set on the server side
custom_steps: When the user attempts to navigate past the date range on the scoreboard, team page, etc by changing their device date
custom_expected:
Then the app will 'lock' on the last allowed date of the season.

(Note: This is controlled by a date range config file)

title: Settings
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the app is in 'Postseason' mode
custom_steps: When the user navs to the app Settings

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps on Homescreen Selection
(without a Favorite team(s) set)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see four options:
Default
Scoreboard
News
Postseason

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps on Homescreen Selection
(with a Favorite team(s) set)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see four options:
Default
Scoreboard
News
Favorite Team
Postseason

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user selects Default
(without a Fav team set)
and the user launches the app from a stopped state
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be taken to the Postseason section on launch

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user selects Default
(with a Fav team set)
and the user launches the app from a stopped state
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be taken to the top favorite team's page on launch

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user selects Postseason
and the user launches the app from a stopped state
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be taken to the Postseason section on launch

title: Two Games on One Page
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the app is in Postseason mode
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Postseason section
And the user navigates to the Wild Card round
custom_expected:
Then the user should see two games
And there should be NO series matchup navigation at the top of the screen.

title: Series Text
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the postseason section
And the user navigates to the Wild Card round
custom_expected:
Then the text underneath each matchup should be configurable
And the text should be used to say "[Team] win AL/NL Wild Card]"

title: Matchup Navigation
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is in the DS or LCS postseason section

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on a matchup's "View Full Series"
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken to full list of games for that series
and the matchup will be highlighted in the segmented tab
and the top header will display the correct series text (ALDS, NLDS, ALCS, NLCS)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user swipes left or right while viewing the full series for a matchup
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be taken to the next matchup's tab
and the correct matchup will be highlighted in the segmented tab

custom_steps_separated.content: Verify top header text corresponds with matchup being viewed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Ex: If the user is viewing an NLDS matchup, that the header text at the top is correct
and if they switch to an ALDS matchup, the header text correctly switches to correspond with that series

title: Default Matchup
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps: When the postseasonScheduleConfig.xml is set to show a specific series as the featured series
custom_expected: Then that series will show by default when the user enters the postseason view

title: *If Necessary Games - DS
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Postseason section
And the user looks at the Division Series
custom_expected:
Then games 4 and 5 should have an asterisk notating that the games will be played "If Necessary"
and the asterisk will be removed if/when the games become necessary

title: *If Necessary Games - LCS
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Postseason section
And the user looks at the League Championship Series
custom_expected:
Then games 5, 6, and 7 should have an asterisk notating that the games will be played "If Necessary"
and the asterisk will be removed if/when the games become necessary

title: Teams & Series Status
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Postseason section
And the user selects the Division Series or League Championship Series
custom_expected:
Then at the top of each series matchup, the Team vs Team and Series matchup status should appear
And the Team vs. Team should be configurable
And the Series matchup status should reflect the most recently completed game

title: Series Matchup Tabs - DS
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the postseason switch is set to 'On'
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the postseason section
And the user has selected the Division Series round
and taps on "View Full Series" of a particular series matchup
custom_expected:
Then the user will see all the games listed for that particular series matchup 
and there will be FOUR tabs in the segmented control at the top of the section
And the four tabs should contain the 3 letter team codes for the each series matchup (eg. WAS vs. LAD)

title: Series Matchup Tabs - LCS
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the postseason switch is set to 'On'
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the postseason section
And the user has selected the League Championship series round
and taps on "View Full Series" of a particular series matchup
custom_expected:
Then the user will see all the games listed for that particular series matchup
and there will be TWO tabs in the segmented control at the top of the section
And the four tabs should contain the 3 letter team codes for the each series matchup (eg. WAS vs. LAD)

title: Default Series
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the default selected round and game has been set on the server side
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the postseason section
And the user navigates to either the DS or LCS
custom_expected:
Then the default series should appear
And the tab for that series should appear selected in the tabset at the top of the page.

title: TBD Teams
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the teams for the DS or LCS have not been set yet
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the postseason section
And the user navigates to the DS or LCS rounds
custom_expected:
Then the user should see 'TBD' listed in place of the 3 letter team codes in the tabset matchups.
And if one of the two teams is set, the user should see '[Team] vs. TBD'

title: *If Necessary Games
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Postseason section
And the user looks at the World Series round
custom_expected:
Then games 5, 6, and 7 should have an asterisk notating that the games will be played "If Necessary"
and the asterisk will be removed if/when the games become necessary

title: Teams & Series Status
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Postseason section
And the user selects the World Series.
custom_expected:
Then at the top of each series matchup, the Team vs Team and Series matchup status should appear
And the Team vs. Team should be configurable
And the Series matchup status should reflect the most recently completed game.

title: Postseason News Category
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the four series have been added to the the editorial index
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the News section

custom_steps_separated.content: without a favorite team set
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then in the news filter drop-down, the user will see a Postseason category under the "MLB" filter
and there will be five filters in that category 
(Postseason, World Series, League Championship Series, Division Series, Wild Card)

custom_steps_separated.content: with a favorite team(s) set
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then in the news filter drop-down, the user will see the "MLB" filter
followed by a Favorite Teams category, with their favorite team(s)' news filter
followed by a Postseason category, and there will be five filters in that category 
(Postseason, World Series, League Championship Series, Division Series, Wild Card)

title: Round Filters
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the applicable rounds have been added to the editorial index
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the News section
And the user taps on one of the Postseason Round News Filters
custom_expected:
Then the user will see an index with news articles specific to that particular round  
And the selected index will be a drop down for the other active indices

title: Tapping Round Filter
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the postseason rounds have been added to the editorial index
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to a news index for a specific round
And the user taps the selected filter cell at the top of the news index
custom_expected: Then the user will see a popup where they can choose another filter for another available round and available team news indices

title: MLB.com Cell
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there are articles populating the postseason rounds
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to a news index for a given playoff round
And the user taps the Round's News Filter
And the user taps MLB.com in the News Filter
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken back to the top level of the news section where the MLB.com headlines will appear in the list

title: Postseason News Article
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there have been postseason rounds added to the editorial index
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the News section
and taps a given Postseason round

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps an article in the filtered news index
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the article should open
And the article should appear exactly the same as any other article.

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the device back button OR the user taps the 'Up' button at the top of the article
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should be taken back from the article to the news index for the filter they previously selected
Verify that the user is NOT taken back to the main MLB.com headlines index where they would have to select a round again.

title: Verify: As new playoff rounds are added to the .xml, they appear in the news section
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps: When new rounds are added to the news .xml
custom_expected: Then those rounds will appear as cells at the top of the news section directly below the team filter drop down.

title: ***Postseason news - default series indexes are configurable - verify that they can be reordered with the configuration file
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When a default news index is set in the postSeasonNewsConfig.xml
And the user navigates to the Postseason News filter in the News section
custom_expected:
Then the default series index should load
And the default series should appear selected in the postseason news filter

title: ***Postseason news - default series indexes are configurable - verify that series news indexes can be added/removed with the configuration file
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
And the user has navigated to the News section
And the user has selected the Postseason News filter in the New filters drop down
custom_expected:
Then only the series indexes that are set in the postSeasonNewsConfig,xml should appear for the user
And when series are added or removed from the postSeasonNewsConfig.xml, they should act accordingly.

title: Spanish
custom_preconds:
Given the device language is set to Spanish
and Postseason mode is enabled
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the News section
custom_expected:
Then the user will see the Postseason News indices in Spanish
and will be able to tap on MLB.com menu button to select from the various filters

title: Postseason Video Category
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the postseason series have been added to the the editorial index
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Videos section

custom_steps_separated.content: without a favorite team set
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then in the video filter drop-down, the user will see a Postseason category under the "MLB" filter
and there will be five filters in that category 
(Postseason, World Series, League Championship Series, Division Series, Wild Card)

custom_steps_separated.content: with a favorite team(s) set
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then in the video filter drop-down, the user will see the "MLB" filter
followed by a Favorite Teams category, with their favorite team(s)' video filter
followed by a Postseason category, and there will be five filters in that category 
(Postseason, World Series, League Championship Series, Division Series, Wild Card)

title: Round Filters
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the applicable rounds have been added to the editorial index
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Videos section
And the user taps on one of the Postseason Round Video Filters
custom_expected:
Then the user will see an index with video highlights specific to that particular round  
And the selected index will be a drop down for the other active indices

title: Tapping Round Filter
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the postseason rounds have been added to the editorial index
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to a video index for a specific round
And the user taps the selected filter cell at the top of the video index
custom_expected: Then the user will see a popup where they can choose another filter for another available round and available team video indices

title: Postseason Video Highlight
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there have been postseason rounds added to the editorial index
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Videos section
and taps a given Postseason series type

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps a video highlight in the filtered video index
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the video should launch
And the video should play exactly the same as any other video.

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the device back button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should be taken back from the video to the video index for the filter they previously selected
Verify that the user is NOT taken back to the main MLB.com headlines index where they would have to select a round again.

title: MLB.com Cell
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there are video highlights populating the postseason rounds
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to a video index for a given playoff round
And the user taps the Round Filter
And the user taps MLB.com in the Video Filter
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken back to the top level of the videos section where MLB.com videos will appear in the list

title: "Season" Filter
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And a 'season' filter has been set on the server side
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Stats section of the app
And the user taps the 'Season' drop down
custom_expected:
Then the following Postseason options will appear in the menu:
Postseason, Wild Card, Division Series, LCS, World Series

title: Default Filter
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And a 'Season' filter has been set as the 'Default' filter on the server side
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Stats section of the app
custom_expected:
Then the default filter that is selected should be the one that was set
And the stats on the Stats leaders page should be filtered according to the selected 'season'

title: Postseason Filters Open Corresponding Stats
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the installed build is pointing to a data source that has data for each postseason series. (Build pointing to last year's data if necessary)
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Stats section
And the user taps the Filters button
And the user selects any of the postseason rounds
custom_expected:
Then the stats displayed should reflect the round selected.
And if the user selected the main 'Postseason' filter the stats should show all postseason statistics.

title: Player Card
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Stats section of the app
And the user selects a player from the Stats leaders section for a particular statistic
custom_expected:
Then the player card should load in a webview
And the player card should contain both regular season and postseason statistics.

title: Series Filter (Game One of series not completed yet)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the first game of a round has not been completed
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Stats section
And the user taps the filters button
And the user taps the 'Season' drop down
custom_expected: Then the user should not see options for any series that have not yet completed their first game.

title: Matchup Status
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there are postseason games in the schedule

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the scoreboard page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then above each scheduled game, the series matchup status should be displayed in place of the Free Game of the Day text

Examples:
[Team short code] wins NL Wild Card
ALDS Game 1
NLDS Game 4: [Team short code] leads series 2-1
NLCS Game 1
ALCS Game 3: [Team short code] wins series 4-1
World Series Game 4

custom_steps_separated.content: Tapping on the series matchup status text
custom_steps_separated.expected: Will take the user to that series' page in the Postseason section

title: Pitcher Stats (Games 1-3)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there are scheduled postseason games with statistics

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navigates to the scoreboard section of the app
And looks at a game in the 'preview' state for any of the postseason games 1-3 for each series.
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the scheduled pitchers statistics will show their regular season statistics

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the Gameday preview page for any of the postseason games 1-3 for each series.
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the scheduled pitchers statistics will show their regular season statistics

title: Tickets Link
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Scoreboard section of the app
And the user taps on the Tickets link from the popover menu
custom_expected: Then the user should be taken to the corresponding postseason tickets page (No promotions tab on this page)

title: Matchup Status Change
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And at least two games for a given series have been completed
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the scoreboard page
custom_expected:
Prior to the day a series begins the Scoreboard will show Game 1, Game 2, Game 3, etc. 

Then the series matchup status for each game will change when the corresponding game goes final and lock for that day's results.

This will continue until the series is complete where the winning team will show (Yankees win series 4-3).

ALL GAMES NOT NEEDED WILL BE REMOVED FROM SCOREBOARD

title: Team Page
custom_preconds: Given the user is on a team page of an eliminated team
custom_steps: When the team page is displayed in Off-Season mode

custom_steps_separated.content: Schedule
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the top schedule module will be removed
and a "[Current Year] Results" tab will be added to the Team Info section
and that tab will point to the native April [Current Year] Schedule Calendar View 

The team's json file http://mlb.mlb.com/v1/team/atbat/en/android/phone/$[club].json should contain the following fields:

"moreInfoResultsYear":[Current Year],
"moreInfoResultsMonth":4,
"hideSchedule":1,
"hideMoreInfoResults":0,

custom_steps_separated.content: Available Sections
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the team page sections will be listed as follows:

Top Stories
Videos
[Team] Insider
[Team] Info
More from the [Team]

custom_steps_separated.content: Club Info section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
The Club Info section will have the following order:

Transactions
Roster
Coaches
Stats
Next season schedule
Last season results
Standings
Ballpark

title: Tickets
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the team page for a non-playoff team
custom_expected:
Then the Tickets section will be completely hidden
and the team's json file http://mlb.mlb.com/v1/team/atbat/en/android/phone/$[club].json should contain the following fields:

"hideTicketsGames":1,
"hideTickets":1,

title: Team Page - Postseason Schedule
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there are playoff teams with scheduled postseason games

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navigates to the team page for a playoff team with a scheduled game
and "usePostseasonSchedule" = true in the team mashup
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the number of games shown in schedule module will be reduced to three

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navigates to the team page for a playoff team with a scheduled game
and the Postseason schedule has been enabled in the team mashup
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then it will behave like the regular season team page schedule module:
the three blocks displayed will be the previous game, today's game, next game
and today's game will be highlighted as the default
and the 10am scoreboard flip time will be respected

title: Team Page - Series Status
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there are playoff teams with scheduled postseason games

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the team page for a playoff team with a scheduled game
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the broadcast logo will appear on the same line as the game time

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navigates to the team page for a playoff team with a scheduled game
and "showSeriesStatusRow" = true in the team mashup
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then in the score module of the team page the user should see the the series matchup status appearing as its own highlighted row
and the highlight shade will be the same as the highlighted date block 
and the series matchup status should display according to the information below:

Examples:
AL/NL Wild Card
ALDS/NLDS/ALCS/NLCS/WS Game #: Series tied #-#
ALDS/NLDS/ALCS/NLCS/WS Game #: [Team short code] leads #-#

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navigates to the team page for a playoff team with a scheduled game that is more than 1 day in the future
(ex: if today is Game 1 and tomorrow is Game 2, then this would apply for Games 3-7)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the series status will not be shown in the game preview information, just the game number

title: Team Page - Live Games
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there are playoff teams with LIVE postseason games

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the team page for a playoff team with a LIVE game
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then in the score module of the team page the user should see the broadcaster logo on the same line as the game state/inning status

title: Tickets
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the team page for a team that is in the postseason
And the user taps the tickets link on their page
custom_expected: Then the user should be taken to the postseason ticket information page for that team. (No promotions tab should appear on the page)

title: Team Page (Eliminated Teams)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And teams are beginning to be eliminated from the postseason
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the team page for a team that has been eliminated
custom_expected:
Then the linescore for the last game that team played will appear in the main section
And verify we can put these teams in off-season mode the day after they have been eliminated (check with PM for the exact timing that this change will go through)

title: Tickets (Eliminated Teams)
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the team page for a playoff team that has since been eliminated from the postseason
custom_expected: Then the tickets section will be hidden

title: MLB.TV (National Feed)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there are Postseason TV feeds set up for the day
custom_steps: When the user taps the TV icon in the top right corner of the app

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps a Postseason game on the EPG with live feeds
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see all the available feeds for that game

custom_steps_separated.content: When a LITE user attempts to launch the US (NAT) feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the TV paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: When an At Bat Premium user attempts to launch the US (NAT) feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see the TV paywall
and a message saying: "You are not an MLB.TV customer. Try signing in with another MLB account."

custom_steps_separated.content: When a Single Team user attempts to launch the US (NAT) feed of a game with their team playing
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be brought to the MVPD cable auth page
where they will be able to log in with their cable credentials

custom_steps_separated.content: When a Single Team user attempts to launch the US (NAT) feed of a game which their team isn't playing
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see an Access Issue message

custom_steps_separated.content: When a TV Premium user attempts to launch the US (NAT) feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be brought to the MVPD cable auth page
where they will be able to log in with their cable credentials

custom_steps_separated.content: When a TV Premium user attempts to log in to the MVPD auth page with their cable credentials
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user's MLB.com account will be linked to their cable account
and the National feed will begin to stream

custom_steps_separated.content: When a TV Premium user, who has already linked their MLB.com account with their cable credentials, attempts to launch any US (NAT) feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the feed will launch and play without issue
and the user should not be prompted to log in again through the MVPD cable auth page

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a TV Premium user is watching the US (NAT) feed
and taps the feed selector button within the media player
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should only be able to choose from the other MLB.TV feed (INT)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a TV Premium user is watching the US (NAT) feed
and selects the INT feed via the media player feed selector button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a National Blackout message

title: MLB.TV (International Feed)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there are Postseason TV feeds set up for the day
custom_steps: When the user taps the TV icon in the top right corner of the app

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps a Postseason game on the EPG with live feeds
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see all the available feeds for that game

custom_steps_separated.content: When a LITE user attempts to launch the International feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the TV paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: When an At Bat Premium user attempts to launch the International feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see the TV paywall
and a message saying: "You are not an MLB.TV customer. Try signing in with another MLB account."

custom_steps_separated.content: When a Single Team user attempts to launch the International feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a National Blackout message

custom_steps_separated.content: When a TV Premium user attempts to launch the International feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a National Blackout message

custom_steps_separated.content: When an executive user (no blackouts) attempts to launch the International feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the feed will launch and play without issue

custom_steps_separated.content:
When an executive user is watching the International feed
and taps the feed selector button within the media player
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should only be able to choose from the other MLB.TV feed (NAT)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When an executive user is watching the International feed
and selects the NAT feed via the media player feed selector button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the International feed should change to the National feed
and the user should not be prompted to log in or relaunch the feed

title: Blackout Message
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with TV-entitled account
and taps on a MLB.TV Postseason feed

custom_steps_separated.content: inside the US and taps on international feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the Blackout Message

custom_steps_separated.content: outside the US and taps on the national feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the Blackout Message

title: Archive
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a user taps on a Postseason archive feed

custom_steps_separated.content: as a Lite user
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the MLB.TV Paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: as a At Bat user
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the MLB.TV Paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: as a Single Team User (own team's feed)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the archive feed will start

custom_steps_separated.content: as a Single Team User (another team's feed)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will receive an Access Issue message

custom_steps_separated.content: as a TV-entitled User
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the archive feed will start

custom_steps_separated.content: Executive Account
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the archive feed will start

title: All Premium User (w/o MVPD) can play Game Recap & Condensed Game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is a Premium user (w/o MVPD)
and attempts to access a Postseason game recap
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to access and play the Postseason game recaps

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is a Premium user (w/o MVPD)
and attempts to access a Postseason condensed game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to access and play the Postseason condensed game

title: Carrier Network
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there are postseason TV feeds available

*If testing in QA, turn VPN on to view the feeds
custom_steps: When the user attempts to launch a postseason TV feed over carrier network (Test AT&T, T-Mobile, Sprint, Verizon)
custom_expected: Then the stream should play without issue.

title: Logged In TV-Entitled User
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user has logged in to At Bat with an MLB account that is TV-entitled
and there are live Postseason TV feeds available

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to the MLB.TV EPG via the TV icon in the top left corner
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be presented with the day's TV feeds

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps a live US Feed for any of the participating networks
(TBS, FS1, FOX, MLBN)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be prompted that "At Bat wants to use 'mlb.com' to sign in"

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps "Continue" from the prompt
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to a webview where they can select their cable provider from a drop-down

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects their cable provider from the drop down
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is taken to the provider login page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user enters valid cable provider credentials that include the network package
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is deeplinked back to the app and the feed will launch

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs back to the TV EPG
and selects a live Postseason feed from the same network they auth'd for
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be able to successfully launch the feed

title: In-App Purchase TV-Entitled User
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user has purchased TV via in-app purchase
and is not logged in to the app
and has NOT linked to an MLB account

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to the MLB.TV EPG via the TV icon in the top left corner
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be presented with the day's TV feeds

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps a live US Feed for any of the participating networks
(TBS, FS1, FOX, MLBN)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be prompted that "At Bat wants to use 'mlb.com' to sign in"

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps "Continue" from the prompt
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to a webview where they can select their cable provider from a drop-down

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects their cable provider from the drop down
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is taken to the provider login page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user enters valid cable provider credentials that include the network package
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is deeplinked back to the app and the feed will launch

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs back to the TV EPG
and selects a live Postseason feed from the same network they auth'd for
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be able to successfully launch the feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs to Settings
and logs in to the app with a non-entitled MLB account
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user's in-app purchase and the cable auth entitlements will now be linked to the MLB account

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user tries to launch a live Postseason US feed from the same network they auth'd for
after having linked to an MLB account
and remains logged in to the MLB account
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be able to successfully launch the feed

title: Non-Participating Networks
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user is TV-entitled

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user tries to access a non-participating Postseason game (i.e. games tied to broadcasters that don't support MVPD access for U.S. users during the Postseason) (ESPN)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be nationally blacked out of the feed
and will receive a blackout message

title: Cable Auth - Positive
custom_preconds:
Given a user has At Bat installed
and logged in with TV-entitled account
custom_steps:
When a user taps on a MLB.TV Postseason feed
then the user will see the cable auth flow

custom_steps_separated.content:
and has cable creds for FS1
and accessing FS1 feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the feed will start

custom_steps_separated.content:
and has cable creds for Fox
and accessing Fox feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the feed will start

custom_steps_separated.content:
and has cable creds for MLB Network
and accessing MLB Network feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the feed will start

custom_steps_separated.content:
and has cable creds for TBS
and accessing TBS feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the feed will start

title: Cable Auth - Negative
custom_preconds:
Given a user has At Bat installed
and logged in with TV-entitled account
custom_steps:
When a user taps on a MLB.TV Postseason feed
then the user will see the cable auth flow

custom_steps_separated.content:
and does not have cable creds for FS1
and accessing FS1 feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will see a message on the cable auth flow screen that they can't access the feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
and does not have cable creds for Fox
and accessing Fox feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will see a message on the cable auth flow screen that they can't access the feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
and does not have cable creds for MLB Network
and accessing MLB Network feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will see a message on the cable auth flow screen that they can't access the feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
and does not have cable creds for TBS
and accessing TBS feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will see a message on the cable auth flow screen that they can't access the feed

title: All Premium Users
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and there are live Postseason Gameday Audio feeds available

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is an At Bat Premium user
and attempts to access stream game audio live via the Audio EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to stream game audio live

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is a TV-entitled user
and attempts to access stream game audio live via the Audio EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to stream game audio live

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is a Single Team user
and attempts to access stream game audio live via the Audio EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to stream game audio live

title: Gameday Highlights
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps: When a playoff game is ongoing
custom_expected:
Then gameday highlights should not appear in the Video section of Gameday
And the user should see a message that reads "Highlights Coming soon" in place of the highlights
And all the highlights will appear some time after the game has gone final. (Replacing the 'Coming soon' message that appears in-game)

title: Banner
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps: When the tune-in banner has been set by Mobile Ops
custom_expected:
Then the user should see a tune-in banner that will launch a Postseason schedule webview when tapped
Banner locations:
Scoreboard
Postseason view
TV EPG

title: Banner Removal
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps: When the tune-in banner is removed by Mobile Ops
custom_expected: Then the tune-in banner will no longer appear in the app.

title: Current Season (Standings)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the app has been put into Offseason mode
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Standings page
custom_expected: Then the standings page should be locked to the current season.

title: Current Season (Stats)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has bee installed
And the app has been put into Offseason mode
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Stats section
custom_expected: Then the stats should be locked to the current season.

title: Scoreboard (Last Date of World Series)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the World Series has ended
And the app has been put into offseason mode
And the date of the World Series has been set as the "suggested date" in the config file
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Scoreboard section
custom_expected: Then the user should be taken to the date that the world series was completed by default

title: News Index (Offseason Mode)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the app has been put into offseason mode

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to the News section
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the indices should continue to update with new content as long as new content is published to the chosen indices.

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user has the Scoreboard widget installed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the widget will switch from showing the Scoreboard to showing News

title: ***Verify server side way to freeze everthing news videos highlights games etc....
***banners to promote the next years app
Slide Out Menu
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And app is in postseason mode

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the slide out menu
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should see 'Postseason' as one of the available options
And the order of the items should be: Postseason, Scoreboard, News...

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the Postseason menu item
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to the Postseason section of the app.

title: Series Heading
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is in the Postseason section

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps on the heading at the top of the left pane
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should see a popup with each round of the postseason

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps the series/round heading on the top of the left pane
And the user selects a series/round from the pop up menu
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should be shown the round of the postseason that they selected. 
And the heading at the top of the left pane should reflect the selected series.

title: Series View (Matchups)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is in the postseason section

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to each of the rounds of the postseason
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then each round should show the correct number of matchups as listed below:

WC = 2 matchups (1 AL / 1 NL)
DS = 4 matchups (2 ALDS / 2 NLDS)
LCS = 2 matchups (1 ALDS / 1 NLDS)
WS = 1 matchup (1 American League Team / 1 National League Team)

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects a series/round from the pop up menu
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should be shown the round of the postseason that they selected. 
And the heading at the top of the left pane should reflect the selected series.

title: Series Menu (Scrollable if applicable)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is in the postseason section
custom_steps: When the user navigates to a series that has more games than can be fit on the left pane at one time
custom_expected: Then the scoreboard should be scrollable so the user can see the rest of the matchups and games

title: Matchup (Series Type)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is in the postseason section
custom_steps: When the user navigates to a series that has matchups
custom_expected:
Then the Series type (ALDS, NLCS etc...) should be referenced at the top of the heading for each matchup
and the team names in the header should appear as [Away] vs. [Home]

title: Matchup (Status Header)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is in the postseason section
custom_steps: When the user navigates to any of the series
custom_expected:
Then each series should have matchup status header text thats explains which team is leading the series. 


Examples:
[Series] begins [date]
Series Opener
Series Tied 1-1
[Team] lead series 2-1
[Team] win series 4-2

title: Matchup (Logos)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is in the postseason section
custom_steps: When the user navigates to any of the postseason rounds that have series matchups
custom_expected:
Then each of the team's logos should appear in the header for their matchup
and the logos for the home team should appear to the right of the logo for the away team.

title: Number of Games
custom_preconds: Given each round of the postseason is scheduled

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navigates to a given series
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then there should be the correct amount of games for each series type according to the following:



WC = 2 games
DS = 5 games
LCS = 7 games
WS = 7 games

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects a series that has multiple games
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then to the left of each scheduled game, the game number for that series should be displayed. (ie. Game 1, Game 2, Game 3, etc...)

title: *If Necessary Games
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is in the postseason section
And all the games for a given series have not yet been played
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the DS, LCS or WS
custom_expected:
Then an asterisk will appear next to games that are not yet confirmed as necessary. 
And the asterisk will disappear for all games that become necessary during the series. 

Applies to any games not yet required to be played (games 4 (Division Series Only), 5, 6, or 7)

title: Team Names Stack Order
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is in the postseason section
custom_steps: When the user navigates to a given series
custom_expected: Then in each of the game cells for that series, the team matchups should appear as road team on top of home team.

title: Game Score
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is in the postseason section
custom_steps: When the user navigates to a given series
custom_expected: Then in each of the in progress or completed game cells for that series, the game score should appear to the right of the team names stacked road team on top of home team.

title: Game State
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there are games that are in progress or completed
And the user is in the postseason section
custom_steps: When the user navigates to a given series
custom_expected:
Then the game state should appear to the right of the score with the following conditions: 

-Completed Games will display "Final" to the right of the score
-In-progress games will display base markers with any occupied bases highlighted in gold along with the count and number of outs to the right of the score. (Will also display broadcaster logo)
-Unplayed games will list the day, date, time and TV broadcast information to the right of the teams

title: Confirm with MLB.com Schedule
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is in the postseason section
custom_steps: When the user looks at each of the series matchup games
custom_expected: Then the scheduled series and game start times should match the schedule on MLB.com

title: Tappable Game Cells
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user is in the postseason section
custom_steps: When the user taps any of the games in the scoreboard in the left pane
custom_expected:
Then the game should appear tapped and the right screen should show the information for the appropriate game and state

Pregame: Game preview for Lite and Full users
In progress: Ungated features for Lite user and Full gameday for paid users
Postgame: Game wrap + ungated features for Lite user and Game wrap + full gameday postgame for paid users

title: Tappable Game Cells (Warmup)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there is a game in the Warmup state
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the postseason section
And the user taps on a game in the Warmup state
custom_expected: Then the game should open the Gameday view.

title: Tapping Between Games
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the postseason section
And taps wildly between games.
custom_expected:
Then the game that is selected should update
And the selected game should be displayed in the right side of the screen.

title: *If Necessary Text Label
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Postseason section
And chooses a round that has games that are designated as "If Necessary"
custom_expected: Then the corresponding text that reads "*If Necessary" should appear at the bottom of the list of games for that round.

title: Hide Scores
custom_preconds:
Given the app is in Postseason mode
and Hide Scores has been enabled in app Settings
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Postseason section

custom_steps_separated.content: left column
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user settings will be respected
and scores in the left column will be hidden
and there will be a "Show Scores" button on top of the round filter

custom_steps_separated.content:
middle and right columns
(pre-game)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see game preview information in the middle and right columns

custom_steps_separated.content:
middle and right columns
(live or final games)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will still see the game preview in the middle column
and the Matchups & Lineups tabs in the right column

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the "Show Scores" button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the button label will switch over to "Hide Scores"
and the middle and right columns will unlock
and Gameday info for the game being viewed will be available in those columns

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the "Hide Scores" button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the button label will switch over to "Show Scores"
and the middle and right columns will lock
and Gameday info for the game being viewed will not be available in those columns
and will flip back to the game preview info

title: Postseason News Category
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the four series have been added to the the editorial index
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the News section

custom_steps_separated.content: without a favorite team set
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then in the news filter drop-down, the user will see a Postseason category under the "MLB" filter
and there will be five filters in that category 
(Postseason, World Series, League Championship Series, Division Series, Wild Card)

custom_steps_separated.content: with a favorite team(s) set
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then in the news filter drop-down, the user will see the "MLB" filter
followed by a Favorite Teams category, with their favorite team(s)' news filter
followed by a Postseason category, and there will be five filters in that category 
(Postseason, World Series, League Championship Series, Division Series, Wild Card)

title: Round Filters
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the postseason news index has been turned on
And the user is in the News section
custom_steps:
When the user taps on the news index Filter
And the user taps on one of the Postseason Round News Filters
custom_expected:
Then the user will see an index with news articles specific to that particular round
And the selected index will be a drop down for the other active indices

title: News Article
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there are articles in at least one postseason editorial index
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the News section
and the user taps on a given Postseason round
and that Postseason round's news index loads
and the user selects an article from the filtered index
custom_expected: Then the article should load in the right pane.

title: MLB.com Headlines Cell
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the user has navigated to the News section
custom_steps:
When the user selects a postseason round
and the user taps the News filter and selects the 'MLB.com headlines' filter at the top of the new index filters
custom_expected:
Then the user will be taken to the MLB.com headlines index
And the user will see the News articles for the main MLB.com headlines index.

title: Postseason Video Category
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the postseason series have been added to the the editorial index
custom_steps: When the user navigates to the Videos section

custom_steps_separated.content: without a favorite team set
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then in the video filter drop-down, the user will see a Postseason category under the "MLB" filter
and there will be five filters in that category 
(Postseason, World Series, League Championship Series, Division Series, Wild Card)

custom_steps_separated.content: with a favorite team(s) set
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then in the video filter drop-down, the user will see the "MLB" filter
followed by a Favorite Teams category, with their favorite team(s)' video filter
followed by a Postseason category, and there will be five filters in that category 
(Postseason, World Series, League Championship Series, Division Series, Wild Card)

title: Round Filters
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the applicable rounds have been added to the editorial index
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Videos section
And the user taps on one of the Postseason Round Video Filters
custom_expected:
Then the user will see an index with video highlights specific to that particular round  
And the selected index will be a drop down for the other active indices

title: Tapping Round Filter
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And the postseason rounds have been added to the editorial index
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to a video index for a specific round
And the user taps the selected filter cell at the top of the video index
custom_expected: Then the user will see a popup where they can choose another filter for another available round and available team video indices

title: Postseason Video Highlight
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there have been postseason rounds added to the editorial index
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to the Videos section
and taps a given Postseason round

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps a video highlight in the filtered video index
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the video should launch
And the video should play exactly the same as any other video.

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps the device back button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user should be taken back from the video to the video index for the filter they previously selected
Verify that the user is NOT taken back to the main MLB.com headlines index where they would have to select a round again.

title: MLB.com Headlines Cell
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there are video highlights populating the postseason rounds
custom_steps:
When the user navigates to a video index for a given playoff round
And the user taps the Round Filter
And the user taps MLB.com Headlines in the Video Filter
custom_expected: Then the user will be taken back to the top level of the videos section where the MLB.com headlines will appear in the list

title: MLB.TV (National Feed)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there are Postseason TV feeds set up for the day
custom_steps: When the user taps the TV icon in the top right corner of the app

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps a Postseason game on the EPG with live feeds
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see all the available feeds for that game

custom_steps_separated.content: When a LITE user attempts to launch the US (NAT) feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the TV paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: When an At Bat Premium user attempts to launch the US (NAT) feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see the TV paywall
and a message saying: "You are not an MLB.TV customer. Try signing in with another MLB account."

custom_steps_separated.content: When a Single Team user attempts to launch the US (NAT) feed of a game with their team playing
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be brought to the MVPD cable auth page
where they will be able to log in with their cable credentials

custom_steps_separated.content: When a Single Team user attempts to launch the US (NAT) feed of a game which their team isn't playing
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see an Access Issue message

custom_steps_separated.content: When a TV Premium user attempts to launch the US (NAT) feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will be brought to the MVPD cable auth page
where they will be able to log in with their cable credentials

custom_steps_separated.content: When a TV Premium user attempts to log in to the MVPD auth page with their cable credentials
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user's MLB.com account will be linked to their cable account
and the National feed will begin to stream

custom_steps_separated.content: When a TV Premium user, who has already linked their MLB.com account with their cable credentials, attempts to launch any US (NAT) feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the feed will launch and play without issue
and the user should not be prompted to log in again through the MVPD cable auth page

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a TV Premium user is watching the US (NAT) feed
and taps the feed selector button within the media player
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should only be able to choose from the other MLB.TV feed (INT)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When a TV Premium user is watching the US (NAT) feed
and selects the INT feed via the media player feed selector button
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a National Blackout message

title: MLB.TV (International Feed)
custom_preconds:
Given the app has been installed
And there are Postseason TV feeds set up for the day
custom_steps: When the user taps the TV icon in the top right corner of the app

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps a Postseason game on the EPG with live feeds
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see all the available feeds for that game

custom_steps_separated.content: When a LITE user attempts to launch the International feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the TV paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: When an At Bat Premium user attempts to launch the International feed
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the user will see the TV paywall
and a message saying: "You are not an MLB.TV customer. Try signing in with another MLB account."

custom_steps_separated.content: When a Single Team user attempts to launch the International feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a National Blackout message

custom_steps_separated.content: When a TV Premium user attempts to launch the International feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see a National Blackout message

custom_steps_separated.content: When an executive user (no blackouts) attempts to launch the International feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the feed will launch and play without issue

custom_steps_separated.content:
When an executive user is watching the International feed
and taps the feed selector button within the media player
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should only be able to choose from the other MLB.TV feed (NAT)

custom_steps_separated.content:
When an executive user is watching the International feed
and selects the NAT feed via the media player feed selector button
custom_steps_separated.expected:
Then the International feed should change to the National feed
and the user should not be prompted to log in or relaunch the feed

title: Blackout Message
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps:
When a user is logged in with TV-entitled account
and taps on a MLB.TV Postseason feed

custom_steps_separated.content: inside the US and taps on international feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the Blackout Message

custom_steps_separated.content: outside the US and taps on the national feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the Blackout Message

title: Archive
custom_preconds: Given a user has At Bat installed
custom_steps: When a user taps on a Postseason archive feed

custom_steps_separated.content: as a Lite user
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the MLB.TV Paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: as a At Bat user
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will see the MLB.TV Paywall

custom_steps_separated.content: as a Single Team User (own team's feed)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the archive feed will start

custom_steps_separated.content: as a Single Team User (another team's feed)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will receive an Access Issue message

custom_steps_separated.content: as a TV-entitled User
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the archive feed will start

custom_steps_separated.content: Executive Account
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the archive feed will start

title: All Premium User (w/o MVPD) can play Game Recap & Condensed Game

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is a Premium user (w/o MVPD)
and attempts to access a Postseason game recap
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to access and play the Postseason game recaps

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user is a Premium user (w/o MVPD)
and attempts to access a Postseason condensed game
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to access and play the Postseason condensed game

title: Logged In TV-Entitled User
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user has logged in to At Bat with an MLB account that is TV-entitled
and there are live Postseason TV feeds available

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to the MLB.TV EPG via the TV icon in the top left corner
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be presented with the day's TV feeds

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps a live US Feed for any of the participating networks
(TBS, FS1, FOX, MLBN)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be prompted that "At Bat wants to use 'mlb.com' to sign in"

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps "Continue" from the prompt
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to a webview where they can select their cable provider from a drop-down

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects their cable provider from the drop down
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is taken to the provider login page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user enters valid cable provider credentials that include the network package
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is deeplinked back to the app and the feed will launch

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs back to the TV EPG
and selects a live Postseason feed from the same network they auth'd for
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be able to successfully launch the feed

title: In-App Purchase TV-Entitled User
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user has purchased TV via in-app purchase
and is not logged in to the app
and has NOT linked to an MLB account

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user navs to the MLB.TV EPG via the TV icon in the top left corner
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be presented with the day's TV feeds

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user taps a live US Feed for any of the participating networks
(TBS, FS1, FOX, MLBN)
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be prompted that "At Bat wants to use 'mlb.com' to sign in"

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user taps "Continue" from the prompt
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user will be taken to a webview where they can select their cable provider from a drop-down

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user selects their cable provider from the drop down
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is taken to the provider login page

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user enters valid cable provider credentials that include the network package
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user is deeplinked back to the app and the feed will launch

custom_steps_separated.content:
When the user navs back to the TV EPG
and selects a live Postseason feed from the same network they auth'd for
custom_steps_separated.expected: Then the user should be able to successfully launch the feed

title: Non-Participating Networks
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and the user is TV-entitled

custom_steps_separated.content: When the user tries to access a non-participating Postseason game (i.e. games tied to broadcasters that don't support MVPD access for U.S. users during the Postseason) (ESPN)
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be nationally blacked out of the feed
and will receive a blackout message

title: Cable Auth - Positive
custom_preconds:
Given a user has At Bat installed
and logged in with TV-entitled account
custom_steps:
When a user taps on a MLB.TV Postseason feed
then the user will see the cable auth flow

custom_steps_separated.content:
and has cable creds for FS1
and accessing FS1 feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the feed will start

custom_steps_separated.content:
and has cable creds for Fox
and accessing Fox feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the feed will start

custom_steps_separated.content:
and has cable creds for MLB Network
and accessing MLB Network feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the feed will start

custom_steps_separated.content:
and has cable creds for TBS
and accessing TBS feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the feed will start

title: Cable Auth - Negative
custom_preconds:
Given a user has At Bat installed
and logged in with TV-entitled account
custom_steps:
When a user taps on a MLB.TV Postseason feed
then the user will see the cable auth flow

custom_steps_separated.content:
and does not have cable creds for FS1
and accessing FS1 feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will see a message on the cable auth flow screen that they can't access the feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
and does not have cable creds for Fox
and accessing Fox feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will see a message on the cable auth flow screen that they can't access the feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
and does not have cable creds for MLB Network
and accessing MLB Network feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will see a message on the cable auth flow screen that they can't access the feed

custom_steps_separated.content:
and does not have cable creds for TBS
and accessing TBS feed
custom_steps_separated.expected: then the user will see a message on the cable auth flow screen that they can't access the feed

title: All Premium Users
custom_preconds:
Given At Bat is installed
and there are live Postseason Gameday Audio feeds available

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is an At Bat Premium user
and attempts to access stream game audio live via the Audio EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to stream game audio live

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is a TV-entitled user
and attempts to access stream game audio live via the Audio EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to stream game audio live

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is a Single Team user
and attempts to access stream game audio live via the Audio EPG
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is able to stream game audio live

title: Gameday Highlights
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps:
When a playoff game is ongoing
and the user taps on the Gameday Videos tab
custom_expected:
Then Gameday highlights should not appear in the Video section of Gameday
And the user should see a message that reads "Highlights Coming soon" in place of the highlights
And all the highlights will appear some time after the game has gone final. (Replacing the 'Coming soon' message that appears in-game)

title: Banner
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps: When the tune-in banner has been set up by Mobile Ops
custom_expected: Then the user should see a tune-in banner on the Scoreboard that will launch a Postseason schedule webview when tapped

title: Banner Removal
custom_preconds: Given the app has been installed
custom_steps: When the tune-in banner is removed by Mobile Ops
custom_expected: Then the tune-in banner will no longer appear in the app.
